name: Does It Stack?
description:
GET A TASTE OF DOES IT STACK?

  • 5 levels / 15 challenges, ranging from easy to genuinely evil
  • 25 unique objects to play with

To unlock the remaining 15 levels consisting of 45 challenges, the Does It Stack? - Full Stack Edition should be purchased.

-----



Tackle carefully put-together stacking challenges, using the available items creatively. Can you build a tower of toy cars with a bicycle on top? Can you balance a fish on a bowling ball? This is the time to put your fork in the toaster! Get inventive and explore different solutions!



But watch out. If two objects of the same color touch each other, they go BOOM! Be careful, or you might get a heart a-stack.



The stacking challenges get increasingly more absurd, harder, and higher. At some point, you might need a ladder. Ladder not included.



Does It Stack? sets you up for some funny situations. We do the setup, you perform the punchline.



Objects you use in the challenges are unlocked in a sandbox mode. Here, you have all the time in the world to create stacking masterpieces (or disasterpieces). Get inventive, build absurd towers, build incredibly high towers, or just play around with objects. The choice is yours! We offer creative replayability — there's always a higher stack!
